subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Nets, despite their proximity to Manhattan, their success in the early 2000s and their imminent move to Brooklyn, are still viewed as a second-tier franchise in a second-class market.
snippet: The Nets, despite their proximity to Manhattan, their success in the early 2000s and their imminent move to Brooklyn, are still viewed as a second-tier franchise in a second-class market.
